GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.37
GSD.description:
Drivers: hv: vmbus: Increase wait time for VMbus unload

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit 8b4d4bd1f1ce21f74e1af561b74538e5c98ea603, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 911e1987efc8f3e6445955fbae7f54b428b92bd3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Drivers: hv: vmbus: Increase wait time for VMbus unload
